item.title: Hello
item.description: Hello! We’re starting our translation journey here. Updates will be posted on this website. For now, we’ll be translating manga/doujinshi but we might expand later. Hope you enjoy!

item.title: Commission
item.description: Comissions are OPEN Holiday Season Sale Current rates: Translation: $1.5/page $0.5/page Translation + Editing: $3/page $1/page Not all pages have the same density, therefore a dense page (walls of text) might cost more and a sparse page (few to no lines) less. We’ll agree on a price following the rates above as a guide. Available payment methods: Bitcoin, Ethereum Contact: blodsinn666@gmail.com

item.title: Contact
item.description: For any questions or inquiry: Contact: blodsinn666@gmail.com

item.title: Donate
